About Me

Hello there,

My name is Antonio Sebastián Dromundo Escobedo, and I’m a computer scientist.

Developer, geek, guitarist, and swimmer, I’m passionate about open-source projects and making technology accessible for everyone.

I’m curious about data science and cloud computing, looking to bring the benefits of computer science to non-related fields.

I made a brief incursion to agronomic science. It led me to reflect if tech advances are getting to all the people that need them.

My life project is to make technology a pillar of everyday life in Latin America. Education, science, and well-living for all.

Just have it to make it fun.
